snippet: Mitt Romney displayed his organizational and financial muscle in New Hampshire as Rick Santorum’s campaign struggled to keep up with its new top-tier status.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney displays his organizational and financial muscle in New Hampshire as Rick Santorum’s campaign struggles to keep up with its new top-tier status; accepts endorsement of onetime bitter rival Sen John McCain.

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and JEFF ZELENY
byline.contributor: Erik Eckholm contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney displayed his organizational and financial muscle in New Hampshire as Rick Santorum’s campaign struggled to keep up with its new top-tier status.

headline.seo: Romney Showing Financial Muscle for Next Round
headline.main: Romney Takes a Victory Lap as Santorum Plays Catch-Up
headline.print_headline: Romney Showing Financial Muscle For Next Round
